name: wasm
description: npm scripts to generate itk-wasm artifacts.

scripts.build: npm run emscripten && npm run bindgen
scripts.bindgen: npx itk-wasm -s ./mesh-to-polydata -b emscripten-build bindgen --package-name mesh-to-polydata --package-description "Convert an ITK Mesh to a simple data structure compatible with vtkPolyData." --repository 'https://github.com/InsightSoftwareConsortium/ITKMeshToPolyData'
